root.name: Silver Jiken
root.description: OverviewThe Silver Case is a adventure game designed by Suda51 and was the first title to be developed by Grasshopper Manufacture. The game was released on the PlayStation in the Japan on October 7, 1999. A remake was announced for the Nintendo DS with plans to bring the game to audiences outside of Japan for the first time, but it was eventually cancelled in favor of a remake for the 3DS.
